channel.title: POST on Kingsley Samuel
channel.description: Recent content in POST on Kingsley Samuel

item.title: Manage Your Menu
item.description: Menu in the sidebar can be defined within the config.toml or directly in the files. I prefer the config file approach, as this menu is pretty simple.

item.title: Data Science
item.description: I found out about Data Science during CUNY’s 90 Day Challenge which provided access to a plathora of Coursera courses. It peeked my interest because it doesn’t rely on just your computer science skills, but a combination of computer science, statistics and business. It’s a field of study which is not really discussed within school, but fortunately Brooklyn College has added Data Science as a minor which I have decided to enlist in to.
